Description:
***** 1st MONTH RENT FREE and NO APPLICATION FEE! ***** (Limited time offer!)
FULLY EQUIPPED LUXURY APARTMENT HOMES with a LONG LIST of Amenities…In the heart of Howard County, where a better quality of living, gracious style and exceptional service meets affordability! Welcome to Howard County’s hidden gem. Very spacious, Beautiful modern 1 and 2 bedrooms, fully equipped eat-in kitchens, some include a HUGE family room. Enjoy the tranquility of this peaceful neighborhood, conveniently located just minutes from Route 1, Route 29, Route 32, I 95 and the Baltimore-Washington Parkway. Minutes away from Fort Meade and NSA. Close to a wide variety of shopping, dining and entertainment. Offering updated fully equipped apartment homes with full size washer, dryers and dishwashers in each home. Excellent Howard County Public Schools - #1 in Maryland. Please stop in for a tour. Our dedicated staff is here to spoil you with our exceptional customer service.

Description: Your home now at Foxborough Estates, where luxury living meets affordability! Conveniently located in historic Savage, Maryland on Route 1, minutes from I-95, Fort Meade, NSA, Baltimore-Washington Parkway and the Intercounty Connector (ICC) providing easy access to the Capital Beltway, downtown Washington D.C. and downtown Baltimore. Close to a wide variety of shopping, dining and entertainment. Offering newly renovated apartment homes with full size washer and dryers in each home. Kitchens feature full size built in microwaves. Some homes offer walk in closets and breakfast bars. Excellent Howard County Public Schools - #1 in Maryland. Please stop in for a tour. Our dedicated staff is here to spoil you with our exceptional customer service.

Description: Offering updated fully equipped 2 & 3 bedroom rental townhomes and duplexes with full size washer, dryers and dishwasher in each home. Pet Friendly, peaceful, serene community, tucked away in the small quaint Savage mill town, minutes from I-95, Fort Meade, NSA, Baltimore-Washington Parkway and the Intercounty Connector (ICC) providing easy access to the Capital Beltway, downtown Washington D.C. Close to a wide variety of shopping, dining and entertainment. Excellent Howard County Public Schools - #1 in Maryland. If you were here you would be home, nestled in tranquil seclusion, enjoying peace, privacy, comfort & an overall better quality of living. Please stop in for a tour. Our dedicated staff is here to spoil you with our exceptional customer service.

Description: 3 BD 3.5 BA townhome in Savage. Open & airy LR w laminate floors. Eat-in kitchen w plenty of cabinets. Slider to rear deck. Property backs to woods/trees. No yard maintnce. 2 BDS upstairs w 2 full baths additional BD downstairs w updated full bath. Mins to FT Meade/NSA. Walking distance to Historic Savage Mill restaurants shopping Savage Park & Trails. Close to 32 295 95 & Rt 1. NO PETS.

Description: RECENTLY REDUCED RENT PRICE! Spacious 3 level townhouse on quiet cul-de-sac 8 miles from Ft. Meade and with easy access to I-95. Immaculately cared for and move in ready for 7/15/14 start. 3 beds and 2 baths upstairs. Kitchen with Breakfast Area and updated w/new appliances. Large Deck off back & storage shed. Large Family Room in Basement, along with half bath and large laundry/utility room. Minimum 600 credit score required.

Pet Policy:
Dogs Allowed:
Cats and dogs are welcome. Maximum two pets per apartment. No weight limit. Monthly fees: $25 first pet, $15 second pet. Refundable deposit: $300 (first pet only). Breed restrictions and other limitations apply. 
* 200 lb Weight Limit

Description: If you're looking for an apartment located between Baltimore, MD and Washington, DC, welcome to Gateway Village Apartments in Jessup, MD! Our one- and two-bedroom apartments for rent offer ease of living and meticulously cared for homes. Enjoy a full kitchen, separate dining room, ceramic-tile bath, air conditioning, and an in-home washer and dryer. Stroll the grounds and enjoy a picnic near our pond with fountain. You can relax on your private balcony or patio, or work out at our 24-hour, state-of-the-art fitness center. * Set in scenic Howard County, Gateway Village Apartments is just a short drive to Ft. Meade and Columbia, MD. We're close to area parks, Columbia Crossing, Columbia Mall, and Wegmans, as well as to Howard Transit, I-95, I-295, Route 1, and Route 32. Your commutes around town to Howard County schools, Baltimore, or Washington DC will be a pleasure! Assigned parking is provided. Military clause honored; housing choice vouchers welcome. Cats and dogs are allowed.

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher

* Stainless Steel Appliances
* Eat-in Kitchen
* Microwave
* Oven
* Range
* Refrigerator

Description: Beautifully renovated and upgraded apartment building across the street from the historic Savage Mill shops and Ram's Head Tavern, near Laurel and Columbia, Maryland. All stainless steel appliances include dishwasher, disposal, and built-in microwave. Have the convenience of a modern apartment with the charm of a historic small town. Two blocks away is Savage park, which has tennis and basketball courts, large fields and nature paths. Convenient on-site laundry room in basement.
